    Boundaries and marked locations on maps

    Function reference

    Create ggplot2 layers and maps

    layer_group_data()
    Make group layers
    layer_show_context()
    Create a map layer showing a location in context of another area or location
    layer_show_location()
    Layer a location border into a ggplot2 map
    layer_show_markers() layer_number_markers()
    Add a marker layer to a map with or without numbered markers
    make_mapbox_basemap() layer_show_mapbox()
    Use snapbox to make a Mapbox basemap
    make_inset_map()
    Create a map with an inset context map using ggplot2

    Make and modify gt tables

    tbl_marker_key()
    Make a key for a marker map
    tbl_photo_key()
    Create numbered photo key as a gt table (not working)
    gt_geom_sf_rows()
    Add maps of simple features into rows of a gt table

    Utility functions

    get_markers()
    Get markers
